description.value: Play the famous zen tunes in your help desk.
description.title: app description

fail.value: failed to fecth information from the server

legend.value: Want to see how to notify this App? Follow these steps:
legend.title: Description message displayed above the instruction steps in the instruction page

step1.title: Instructions asking the user to copy and paste a code example

step2.value: Click on this App icon to close it
step2.title: Instruction asking the user to close the App

step3.value: Go to your terminal and make sure that you can see your Zendesk at the same time
step3.title: Instruction asking the user to have the terminal and Zendesk window in view at the same time.

step4.value: Paste the CURL sample and edit the dynamic values (access_token, body message)
step4.title: Instruction asking the user to edit and execute the command.

subheading.value: Click Refresh to get tickets priority
subheading.title: incident
